org.trails.descriptor.annotation
Class AbstractDescriptorDecorator

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassDescriptorDecorator, PropertyDescriptorDecorator
public abstract class AbstractDescriptorDecorator
extends java.lang.Object

Constructor Summary
AbstractDescriptorDecorator()
           
 
Method Summary
protected  boolean isDefault(java.lang.annotation.Annotation propertyDescriptorAnno, java.lang.reflect.Method annotationMethod)
          This method will check if an annotation property has a default value by see if there is a field named DEFAULT_ + property name.
protected  void setDescriptorPropertiesFromAnnotation(java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation, IDescriptor descriptor)
          For each attribute of annotation, will search for a matching property on the descriptor and set it with the value of the attribute unless the attribute is set to the "default" value

Constructor Detail

public AbstractDescriptorDecorator()
Method Detail

isDefault

protected boolean isDefault(java.lang.annotation.Annotation propertyDescriptorAnno,
                            java.lang.reflect.Method annotationMethod)
This method will check if an annotation property has a default value by see if there is a field named DEFAULT_ + property name. If it has a default value, we only change the descriptor if the annotation property is NOT set to the default value.

Parameters:
propertyDescriptorAnno -
annotationMethod -
Returns:

setDescriptorPropertiesFromAnnotation

protected void setDescriptorPropertiesFromAnnotation(java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation,
                                                     IDescriptor descriptor)
For each attribute of annotation, will search for a matching property on the descriptor and set it with the value of the attribute unless the attribute is set to the "default" value

Parameters:
annotation -
descriptor -
